definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反对党的政治人物指责政府河川的计划使得农地减少。

sentences.english: Opposition leaders called for ­Nakagawa's immediate dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 反对党领袖要求立刻解雇中川。

sentences.english: Ahmedinejad will nominate a new opposition leader.
sentences.chinese: 内贾德将任命一个新的反对党领袖。

sentences.english: In order to defeat the candidate for senator, the opposing party fished up an old story about a bribe.
sentences.chinese: 为了击败参议员后选人，反对党找出一桩贿赂旧案。

sentences.english: Many in the opposition viewed it as an attempted power grab by the military.
sentences.chinese: 反对党阵营中的很多人都将之视为军方企图夺权。

sentences.english: The opposition was particularly critical of the election to Moscow's council, which controls the city's $40-billion budget.
sentences.chinese: 反对党对俄罗斯杜马选举尤为不满。

sentences.english: The opposition dismissed the report as a whitewash.
sentences.chinese: 反对党认为这份报告文过饰非不予理会。

sentences.english: The Opposition speaker accused the British Government of leading the country up the garden path on the question of civil defence.
sentences.chinese: 反对党发言人指责英国政府把国家领上了一条狭路。

sentences.english: The PF promises to put a stop to political favoritism.
sentences.chinese: 反对党爱国阵线承诺会禁止这种政治倾斜政策。

sentences.english: The Opposition has tabled an amendment to the bill.
sentences.chinese: 反对党已经就该议案提交了一项修正条款。

sentences.english: Then the opposition Nepali Congress Party expects to move into government to oversee elections.
sentences.chinese: 反对党尼泊尔大会党则希望能进驻政府监督选举。

sentences.english: The opposition Whig Party was happy over Van Buren's failures.
sentences.chinese: 反对党辉格党看到范布伦的失败很高兴。

sentences.english: The leader of the Opposition appoints senior Opposition MPs to form the Shadow Cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 反对党领袖也会任命资深反对党组成“影子内阁”。

sentences.english: The leader of the Opposition appoints senior Opposition MPs to form the Shadow Cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 反对党领袖也会任命资深反对党组成“影子内阁”。

sentences.english: As the second-largest party in the Scottish Parliament, they are the official opposition to Labour.
sentences.chinese: 作为苏格兰第二大党，民族党是工党的反对党。

definition: African National Congress, ANC/abbr. for 非洲人國民大會|非洲人国民大会[Fei1 zhou1 ren2 guo2 min2 da4 hui4]
